Uses of Class
coverage.Statement

  • Packages that use Statement 
    Package Description
    coverage  
    manager  

    • Uses of Statement in coverage

      Methods in coverage that return types with arguments of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Statement> Method.getStatementCoverage()
      Get a list of all the Statements covered by this method, i.e., all lines of code affected by this method.
      java.util.List<Statement> Method.getUniqueStatements()
      Get list of statements covered by the unique method, i.e., delete all repeats.
      Methods in coverage with parameters of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Method.addStatement(Statement sttm)
      Add a new object of the type Statement covered by this method.
      Method parameters in coverage with type arguments of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Method.setStatementCoverage(java.util.List<Statement> statementCoverage)
      Send the list of Statement covers this method.

    • Uses of Statement in manager

      Methods in manager that return types with arguments of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Statement> Coverage.getAllStatements(java.util.List<TestSuite> suites)
      Get all Statement in the SUT.
